description: Port is off, due to the overload state according to 802.3af.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Port is off, due to short circuit.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Port is off, due to over system budget.

event.Summary: Port turned off due to exceeding system budget

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: PSE power supply failed, due to the reason of zyxelPoeTrapPsePowerSupplyFailedReason.

event.Summary: PSE power supply failed due to $v1

description: Internal-power-supply-for-PoE-failed(0): Internal power supply for PoE has failed.
RPS-for-PoE-failed(1): External power supply for PoE (RPS) has failed.
RPS-fan-failed(2): RPS fan has failed.
RPS-over-temperature(3): RPS temperature is out of the normal operation range.
variables.name: ZYXEL-POWER-ETHERNET-MIB::zyPoeTrapPsePowerSupplyFailedReason

description: Port is on, since recovered from overload state.

event.Summary: Power port recovered from overload state

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It

starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of

initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Port is on, since recovered from short circuit.

event.Summary: Power port recovered from short circuit

description: Port is on, since recovered from over system budget.

event.Summary: Port restored after exceeding system budget
